name: 10 Question Movie Quiz: Total Recall |   Movies

questions.text: On which planet is most of the film 'Total Recall' set?
Arnie plays two characters - a previous and a current life. What is the name of the current character?
And what is the previous life character called?
The villain, Cohaagen, controls the planet through the monopoly supply of
Arnie's partner in the resistance is called
What is the name of the automated taxicabs used in the film?
What does Arnie employ to get rid of a tracking device?
The film's climax hinges on a reactor linked to the matter at the centre of the planet. What is this matter?
